00048   /* set the following to the number of 100ns ticks of the actual
00049   resolution of
00050   your system's clock */
00051   #define UUIDS_PER_TICK 1024
00052 
00053   /* Set the following to a call to acquire a system wide global lock
00054   */
00055   #define LOCK

00058   typedef unsigned long   unsigned32;
00059   typedef unsigned short  unsigned16;

00063  /* Set this to what your compiler uses for 64 bit data type */
00064   #ifdef WIN32
00065   #define unsigned64_t unsigned __int64
00066   #define I64(C) C
00067   #else
00068   #define unsigned64_t unsigned long long
00069   #define I64(C) C##LL
00070   #endif
